expected_behavior: Wave 0 triage builds a dependency graph (import/export map) for the project
High fan-in files (imported by 5+ others) receive elevated risk classification
Triage report includes dependency graph summary with high fan-in files listed
Blast radius calculation in Judge Step 8 uses dependency graph data for accurate multipliers
Cross-file findings reference the dependency relationship in their evidence
Changed files with importers outside the change set are flagged for cross-file impact review
